backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no logic implemented.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping UI changes to specific frontend files and components with high-confidence traceability.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file, including styling, layout, admin tools, and catalog logic.
frontend/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers and CSS variables for light/dark themes using OKLCH color tokens.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entrypoint mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component with tabbed navigation between public viewer and admin area, wiring catalog state and authentication.
Admin container combining banner manager, upload form, and catalog manager.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminBanne: Admin tool for uploading, validating, saving, and removing a fixed‑size banner image with live state updates.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminCatal: Admin table listing catalog items with remove actions and no collection column.
Login gate handling admin authentication, session persistence, and logout UI.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminUploa: Provides an admin form to create catalog items with title, predefined label, media type, and media source, then submits via onAdd.
frontend/src/components/layout/Backgroun: Renders a fixed background image with a gradient overlay.
frontend/src/components/layout/MasparLay: Defines the main site layout with header, background, footer, and social links, wrapping page content.
frontend/src/components/public/Collectio: Displays selectable collection cards showing name, icon, and item count.
Renders a grid of catalog items with thumbnails and media-type indicators, applying content protection and click handling.
frontend/src/components/public/PublicVie: Combines banner display, search/filter controls, item grid, and media modal to browse public catalog items.
frontend/src/components/public/SearchAnd: Provides search input and label filter dropdown with label thumbnails.
frontend/src/components/viewers/ImageZoo: Shows an image with zoom and rotation controls.
frontend/src/components/viewers/MediaVie: Modal that displays image, video, or PDF viewers for a selected catalog item with content protection.
frontend/src/components/viewers/PdfFirst: Embeds an iframe to display the first page of a PDF.
frontend/src/components/viewers/VideoVie: Renders a video player with download disabled.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor using react-query and refreshes dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCatalog.ts: Loads, cleans, seeds, and manages catalog items in localStorage with add, remove, and refresh helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context for Internet Identity auth, handling identity loading, login, logout, and status tracking.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers, color variables, dark mode, and utility classes including glassmorphism and interaction effects.
frontend/src/lib/adminAuth.ts: Implements simple admin auth using hardcoded credentials and localStorage-based unlock state.
frontend/src/lib/bannerStorage.ts: Stores, retrieves, clears, and syncs banner data in localStorage with custom events and cross-tab updates.
frontend/src/lib/catalogStorage.ts: Manages catalog persistence with legacy label migration plus CRUD helpers for catalog items.
frontend/src/lib/catalogTypes.ts: Defines the CatalogItem interface and supported media types.
frontend/src/lib/collections.ts: Provides default collections and derives the active set from catalog items while ensuring all defaults remain included.
frontend/src/lib/contentProtection.ts: Offers utilities to disable context menu and drag actions on elements to prevent content copying.
frontend/src/lib/labelThumbnails.ts: Maps predefined labels to thumbnail image paths and provides helpers to fetch or check thumbnails.
frontend/src/lib/predefinedLabels.ts: Defines the full predefined label list and utilities to validate label strings.
frontend/src/lib/seedCatalog.ts: Contains an empty seed catalog and lists deprecated IDs and titles for cleanup logic.
frontend/src/lib/uiText.ts: Holds static UI text strings for headers, navigation, admin, public views, and footer.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider and renders the root component.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, content paths, extended Maspar color palette, custom animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s current spec for a mobile-responsive Maspar sales portal, including UI/theme rules, localStorage-based catalog management, known issues, and existing feature metadata.
